spec_data.Name: libunicapgtk
spec_data.Description:
Unicap provides a uniform interface to video capture devices. It allows
applications to use any supported video capture device via a single API.
Building applications with a graphical user interface is made especially
easy with the unicapGTK widget set.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 02:04:55 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library to build graphical widgets for the unicap library
